Package org.boothverse.foodpants.business.services

Class FoodInstanceService

java.lang.Object
org.boothverse.foodpants.business.services.FoodInstanceService
Direct Known Subclasses:
PantryService, ShoppingService
public abstract class FoodInstanceService extends Object
An abstract class dealing with food instances which other services which deal with food instances use

      public List<FoodInstance> getItems()

      Returns:
      the items tracked by the service

    • addItem

      public FoodInstance addItem(String id, javax.measure.Quantity<?> quantity) throws PantsConversionFailedException
      Adds an item to the service and the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the food to be added
      quantity - the quantity of the food instance
      Returns:
      the newly created item
      Throws:
      PantsConversionFailedException

    • addItems

      public void addItems(List<FoodInstance> itemsToAdd)
      Adds the list of items to the service and the database. If the service already has the given food, just add the specified amount to the service.
      Parameters:
      itemsToAdd - a list of food instances to add

    • editItem

      public FoodInstance editItem(String id, javax.measure.Quantity<?> quantity) throws PantsNotFoundException
      Edits the quantity of an item being tracked by the service, and updates the database accordingly. Should throw a custom exception if the item is not found.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the food to be edited
      quantity - the new quantity of the food instance
      Throws:
      PantsNotFoundException

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(String id) throws PantsNotFoundException
      Removes the given item from the service and the database. Should throw a custom exception if the item is not found.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the food to be removed
      Throws:
      PantsNotFoundException
